Lde/ecspride/LibClass;->getIMEI:(Landroi: This method retrieves the device ID from the TelephonyManager. It originates the device ID by calling the `getDeviceId()` method on an instance of `android.telephony.TelephonyManager`. The device ID is returned as a string. No sinks were identified within this method itself.

Lde/ecspride/MainActivity;->onCreate:(La: This method originates user data by calling the `getIMEI` method of the `LibClass` object. The `LibClass` object then uses the `SmsManager` to send a text message containing the IMEI. This involves a call to `sendTextMessage`, which utilizes the `android.telephony.SmsManager` class. The IMEI is transmitted as part of the message. No sinks are identified within this method itself; the data is transmitted via the `sendTextMessage` call. Therefore, no further data propagation or processing is observed within this method.
